Today, Dingle Peninsula is lighting up with 3 ft @ 9s NNW swell and a moderate 11 mph NNW wind. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both offering clean conditions early and throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @ 7s N with fresh 25 mph N winds, making it blown out and poor. The day after continues the trend with similar blown-out conditions at 4 ft @ 7s NW and 23 mph SW winds. Best: today.
